info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 9:24PM EDT until September 08 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LOUISA AND NORTHEASTERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES... At 924 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Charlottesville to near Kents Store, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Ferncliff around 930 PM EDT. Boswells Tavern around 940 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Waldrop, Green Springs, Byrd Mill, Trevilians, Zion Crossroads, Vawter Corner, and Gordonsville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
